enable_install_info: Enable in the options by selecting Menu (Y) -> Advanced -> Install options -> Enable.
Switch-Handheld!: ハンドヘルドになりました!
Switch-Docked!: ドックに接続しました!
Nxlink Upload: Nxlinkにアップロードされました
missing_hbmenu_info: Use the Appstore to re-install hbmenu
Failed to restore hbmenu, please re-down: hbmenuを復元できませんでした、再インストールしてください
Failed to restore hbmenu, using sphaira: hbmenuを復元できませんでした、sphairaを引き続き使います
Restored hbmenu, closing sphaira: hbmenuに復元されました、sphairaを終了します
Warning! Logs are enabled, Sphaira will: 警告: ログが有効になったため、Sphairaの速度が遅くなります
Audio disabled due to suspended game: ゲームが一時停止状態の場合、BGMは無効になります
bgm_enable_info: Each theme can have it's own music file.
If a theme does not set a music file, the default music is loaded instead (if it exists).
display_ip_info: Shows the IP address in all menus, including the WiFi strength.
NOTE: The IP address will be hidden in applet mode due to the applet warning being displayed in it's place.
Removes the background music file: BGMに設定された音楽を解除します
No background music file is set: BGMが設定されていません
web_browser_info: NOTE: The browser is very limted, some websites will fail to load and there's a 30 minute timeout which closes the browser
Replace hbmenu on exit: 終了時に hbmenu を置き換える
hbmenu_replace_info: When enabled, it replaces /hbmenu.nro with Sphaira, creating a backup of hbmenu to /switch/hbmenu.nro
Disabling will give you the option to restore hbmenu.
mount_options_info: Create, modify, delete network mounts (HTTP, FTP, SFTP, SMB, NFS).
Mount options only require a URL and Name be set, with other fields being optional, such as port, user, pass etc.
Any changes made will require restarting Sphaira to take effect.
transfer_boost_info: Enables boost mode during transfers which can improve transfer speed.
This sets the CPU to 1785mhz and lowers the GPU 76mhz
Change how fast the scrolling text updat: テキストの更新速度を変更します
Press OK to restart Sphaira: 確認ボタンを押してSphairaを再起動
Set the menu that appears on the center: 中央タブに表示されるメニューを設定します
Set the menu that appears on the left ta: 左側タブに表示されるメニューを設定します
Set the menu that appears on the right t: 右側タブに表示されるメニューを設定します
install_options_info: You can enable installing from here.
Skip if already installed: 既にインストールされている場合はスキップします
Skip patch: ゲームパッチをスキップ
Skip NCA hash verify: NCAハッシュ検証をスキップ
skip_nca_info: Enables the option to skip sha256 verification. This is a hash over the entire NCA.
It is used to verify that the NCA is valid / not corrupted.
You may have seen the option for "checking for corrupted data" when a corrupted game is installed.
That check performs various hash checks, including the hash over the NCA.
It is recommended to keep this disabled.
Skip RSA header verify: RSAヘッダー検証をスキップ
nca_verify_info: Enables the option to skip RSA NCA fixed key verification.
This is a hash over the NCA header. It is used to verify that the header has not been modified.
The header is signed by nintendo, thus it cannot be forged, and is reliable to detect modified NCA headers (such as NSP/XCI converts).
It is recommended to keep this disabled, unless you need to install nsp/xci converts.
npdm_verify_info: Enables the option to skip RSA NPDM fixed key verification.
Currently, this option is stubbed (not implemented).
nca_distbit_info: If set, it will ignore the distribution bit in the NCA header.
The distribution bit is used to signify whether a NCA is Eshop or GameCard.
You cannot (normally) launch install games that have the distruction bit set to GameCard.
It is recommended to keep this disabled.
ticket_convert_info: [Requires keys] Converts personalised tickets to common (fake) tickets.
It is recommended to keep this enabled.
titlekey_crypto_info: [Requires keys] Converts titlekey to standard crypto, also known as "ticketless".
It is recommended to keep this disabled.
Lower master key: 下位マスターキーを許容
keyarea_crypto_info: [Requires keys] Encrypts the keak (key area key) with master key 0, which allows the game to be launched on every fw.

Do note that just because the game can be launched on any fw (as it can be decrypted), doesn't mean it will work. It is strongly recommened to update your firmware and Atmosphere version in order to play the game, rather than enabling this option.
It is recommended to keep this disabled.
Lower system version: 下位システムバージョンを許容
cnmt_fw_info: Sets the system_firmware field in the cnmt extended header to 0.
Note: if the master key is higher than fw version, the game still won't launch as the fw won't have the key to decrypt keak (see above).
It is recommended to keep this disabled.
Created nested folder: ネストされたフォルダを作成
game_folder_info: Creates a folder using the name of the game.
xci_folder_info: XCI dumps will name the folder with the .xci extension.
Some devices only function is the xci folder is named exactly the same as the xci.
Label trimmed XCI: トリム済みXCIのラベルを指定
compress_level_info: Sets the compression level used when exporting to NSZ.
NOTE: The switch CPU is not very fast, and setting the value too high can
result in exporting taking a very long time for very little gain in size.
It is recommended to set this value to 3.
compress_threads_info: Sets the number of threads used when compression the NCA.
A value less than 3 allows for another thread to run freely, such as read/write threads.
However in my testing, a value of 3 was usually the most performant.
A value of 0 will use no threads and should only be used for testing as it is always slower.
It is recommended to set this value between 1-3.
block_compress_info: Enables block compression, which compresses the NCA into blocks (at the cost of compression ratio)
which allows for random access, allowing the NCZ to be mounted as a file system.
NOTE: Sphaira does not yet support mounting NCZ as a file system, but it will be added evntually.
login_require_info: Allows you to login without setting a username and password.
If disabled, you must set a user name and password below!
bis_contents_info: Shows the bis folder which contains the following:
bis_fs_info: Shows the following bis file systems:
microsd_contents_info: NOTE: This is not the normal microSD card storage, it is instead
the location where NCA's are stored. The normal microSD card is always mounted.
games_ftp_info: This folder contains all of your installed games, allowing you to create
NOTE: This folder is read-only. You cannot delete games over FTP.
install_ftp_info:
Shows the install folder.
This folder is used for installing games via FTP.
NOTE: You must open the "FTP Install" menu when trying to install a game!
mounts_ftp_info: This folder is contains all of the mounts added to Sphaira, allowing you to acces them over FTP!
For example, you can access your SMB, WebDav or other FTP mounts over FTP.
homebrew_folder_info: Shows the shortcut for the /switch folder.
This is the folder that contains all your homebrew (NRO's).
prealloc_info: Enables pre-allocating the file size before writing.
This speeds up file writes, however, this can cause timeouts if all these conditions are met:
This option should be left enabled, however if you use the above and experience timeouts,
then try again with this option disabled.
games_mtp_info: This folder contains all of your installed games, allowing you to create
NOTE: This folder is read-only. You cannot delete games over MTP.
install_mtp_info:
Shows the install folder.
This folder is used for installing games via MTP.
NOTE: You must open the "MTP Install" menu when trying to install a game!
mounts_mtp_info: This folder is contains all of the mounts added to Sphaira, allowing you to acces them over MTP!
For example, you can access your SMB, WebDav and FTP mounts over MTP.
usb_benchmark_info: This folder is used for benchmarking USB uploads.
This ia virtual folder, nothing is actally written to disk.
mount_hdd_info: Enable mounting of connected USB/HDD devices.
Connected devices can be used in the FileBrowser, as well as a backup location when dumping games and saves.
USB connected, sending file list: 接続されました、ファイルリスト送信します
ファイルリストを送信しました、入力を待っています
USBの接続を待っています
Pushing application record: アプリの記録をプッシュ中
Failed to remove old forwarder, please m: 古いForwarderを削除できませんでした、手動で削除してください!
If this message appears repeatedly, plea: このメッセージが繰り返し表示される場合、問題を開いてください
Are you sure you wish to cancel?: 本当に取り消しますか?
More by Author: ディベロッパーの他のアプリを見る
Filter: %s | Sort: %s | Order: %s: フィルター: %s | 並べ替え: %s | 順番: %s
このフォルダーは空です
Select launcher for:: 起動ランチャーを選ぶ:
Install Selected files?: 選択したファイルをインストールしますか?
Installed: インストールしました
Failed to delete directory: フォルダーを削除できませんでした
Failed to delete file: ファイルを削除できませんでした
ハッシュ化できませんでした

Hidden Last: 非表示ファイルを劣後
Are you sure you want to extract to root: 最上位ルートに解凍してよろしいですか?
Enter the path to the folder to extract: 解凍したいルートを指定してください

Close FileBrowser?: ファイルブラウザを閉じますか?
Connection Type: Ethernet: 接続: イーサネット
Launch random game: ゲームをランダム起動
Are you sure you want to delete: 消去してもよろしいですか
Updating application record list: ゲームのレコードを更新しています
nca_validate_info: Performs sha256 hash over the NCA to check if it's valid.
NOTE: This only detects if the hash is missmatched, it does not validate if
the content has been modified at all.
nca_fixedkey_info: Performs RSA NCA fixed key verification.
This is a hash over the NCA header. It is used to verify that the header has not been modified.
The header is signed by nintendo, thus it cannot be forged, and is reliable to detect modified NCA headers (such as NSP/XCI converts).
GameCard: ゲームカードインストール
Gc install failed!: ゲームカードインストール失敗!
Gc install success!: ゲームカードインストール完了!
Select content to dump: 吸出すコンテンツを選択
System memory %.1f GB: 本体保存メモリー %.1f GB
No GameCard inserted: ゲームカードが挿入されていません
WARNING: GameCard is already trimmed!: 警告: ゲームカードがすでにトリムされています!
Failed to download json: JSONからのダウンロードに失敗しました!
Select asset to download for: ダウンロードアイテムを選択
Failed to download app!: アプリのダウンロードに失敗しました!
Updated (Star): アップデート順(お気に入り)
Alphabetical (Star): アルファベット順(お気に入り)
Size (Star): ファイルサイズ(お気に入り)
hb_remove_info: Files and folders created by the homebrew will still remain.
Use the FileBrowser to delete them.
FTP経由でインストールできませんでした、を押して終了します
Negative image: ネガティブなイメージ
Negative Image: ネガティブなイメージ
Trimming Format: トリミングされた解像度
Download via the Network options!: ネットワーク設定からダウンロードしました!
Download update:: アップデートをダウンロード:
Failed to download update: アップデートのダウンロードに失敗しました
ftp_settings_info: Enable / modify the FTP server settings such as port, user/pass and the folders that are shown.
NOTE: Changing any of the options will automatically restart the FTP server when exiting the options menu.
mtp_settings_info: Enable / modify the MTP responder settings such as the folders that are shown.
NOTE: Changing any of the options will automatically restart the MTP server when exiting the options menu.
nxlink_enable_info: Enable NXlink server to run in the background.
NXlink is used to send .nro's from PC to the switch
If you are not a developer, you can disable this option.
nxlink_toggle_info: Toggle FTP, MTP, HDD and NXlink
If Sphaira has a update available, you can download it from this menu
translation_info: If your language isn't found, or translations are missing, please consider opening a PR at
advanced_options_info: Please view the info boxes to better understand each option.
save_backuprestore_info: Restore the save for the current title.
if "Auto backup" is enabled, the save will first be backed up and then restored.
Saves that are auto backed up will have "Auto" in their name.
save_backup_compress_info: If enabled, backups will be compressed to a zip file.
NOTE: Disabling this option does not disable the zip file, it only disables compressing
the files stored in the zip.
Disabling will result in a much faster backup, at the cost of the file size.
Disable MTP for usb install: USBインストールのため、MTPを無効にします
Installed via usb: USBインストールに成功しました
接続されました、ファイルリストを待っています
接続されました、転送を開始します
データを転送しています
USB接続できませんでした、を押して終了します
mount_readonly_info: Mount the filesystem as read only.
Setting this option also hidens the mount from being show as an export option.
filecheck_disable_info: Enabling stops the file browser from checking the file size and timestamp of each file.
dircheck_disable_info: Enabling stops the file browser from checking how many files and folders are in a folder.
This improves browsing performance, especially for servers that has slow directory listing.
